participant_1.background:
I have a crib in my home gym for when my nieces and nephews come to visit.
i am gay but i have not told my parents yet.
I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
i like to grow my own herbs and vegetables in my garden.
I can't live without my friends, especially when we go out for pizza together.

participant_2.background:
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
i work at a factory.
I try to do my laundry every other day, but I sometimes have to skip a day or two because of my theater commitments.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a childrens librarian.

content.text: I love reading comics and writing them. I hope to be published someday.
That is a cool hobby. I like to grow my own herbs and veggies. I have a garden.
That sounds like a fun hobby. Do you have a lot of plants?
I do, I have a lot of herbs and a few vegetables. I love to cook with them.
That sounds delicious. I love to eat vegetables. What is your favorite thing to cook with them?
I love to make pizza with fresh basil and tomatoes from my garden.
That sounds delicious. I love pizza. I make it at home a lot.
That is great. I love to make pizza with my friends. We have a pizza party every week.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I had more friends to have pizza parties with.
You can always come to our pizza parties. We love having new people.
Thanks for the invite. I would love to come to a pizza party.
